duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform diversified clerical functions in Registration/Information, Appointments, Patient Care modules, and other areas such as Cashiering and Medical Records.
Create follow-up appointments, appointments for specialty services, and ensure referrals are in place.
Greet all patients, family, or other related individuals while maintaining excellent customer service at all times.
Demonstrate Electronic Health Record (eHR) competencies, including scanning insurance cards, capturing patient photos for the eHR, and facilitating patient flow.
Work in conjunction with the healthcare team, participating in site improvement efforts, accepting coverage assignments, and providing translation assistance as needed.
Register patients, perform financial functions, and handle telephone operations in accordance with established policies.
Report problems with workflow, conflicts, further skill training, and other related concerns to supervisory staff.
Perform other functions as assigned by supervisory staff.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent required
